Morale is suffering greatly. The {@LinkCreature:27#10#Thulsan slayers} and {@LinkCreature:27#8#Thulsan berserkers} are massacring our troops.

We need a rallying point to use against the Brogar Legion. I need you to strike down their troops and snatch their weapons. We'll use them as a symbol of hope, proof that we can handle Thulsa's forces.

This is how the Brogar Legion arms its soldiers?

Such savage weapons. Too much blood have these spilt from the young men and women of the federation. But not today. Thank you, . This is a great victory.
If we do not commandeer the weapons of the Brogar Legion, this battle will drag on forever. Please hurry.
